tag_list: mobile, mobile-content, sms, wap, wireless, cryptopix, atlantis
overview:
Matt Sapero oversees the creative design, content, and business development efforts for CryptoPix.

Previously, Matt scouted and signed hundreds of top artists, photographers, animators, record labels, video producers and application creators for the mobile content space. He also established relationships with top mobile channels. The artists he scouted and signed appear in the top mobile wallpaper rankings on the decks of wireless network operators and portals throughout North America.

Matt also co-founded Team Atlantis, an underwater archaeological research team, with Mike Arbuthnot. His adventures have taken him to Yonaguni, Japan’s underwater monument, Chichen Itza and other regions of the Mayan Yucatan, and the Long Rocks off Cat Island, Bahamas. He’s also traveled to over 25 countries exploring mankind’s lost history from Newgrange in Ireland to passageways beneath Jerusalem and the massive pyramids of central China.
